title: Panthers QB Competition, NFC East Checklist, Pivotal Player in NFC West, and Chiefs Justin Reid
itunes:title: Panthers QB Competition, NFC East Checklist, Pivotal Player in NFC West, and Chiefs Justin Reid
description:
The Good Morning Football Podcast begins with the Panthers inviting a QB competition between Baker Mayfield and Sam Darnold.  Hosts Rachel Bonnetta, Tom Pelissero, Adam Rank, and Fmr NFL DB Darius Butler dissect the checklist of needs for each team in the NFC East.  We turn our attention to the most pivotal player in the NFC West and Rachel explains why it's Kyler Murray.  The table wonders if WR N'Keal Harry will benefit from a fresh start after being traded to the Bears.  Plus, new Chiefs safety Justin Reid drops by the studio to talk about his conversations with Patrick Mahomes and his love of soccer.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
